articles.content: A Curtis Jones goal and a late 2-0 lead werent enough to save England from crashing out of the group stage of the U21 European Championship tonight, and tempers flared after the final whistle. The Yo… [+1581 chars]
articles.description: The midfielder’s goal wasn’t enough to save England’s U-21’s from crashing out of the U-21 European Championship.
articles.title: Liverpool International Roundup: Jones Scores and Sees Red In Euros Elimination - The Liverpool Offside
